snippet.title: Go! Go! Kokopolo 3D - Space Recipe For Disaster - 3DS eShop Trailer 2017
snippet.description:
Go! Go! Kokopolo 3D - Space Recipe For Disaster!
Get ready to return to the world's first Chase 'em up - in an all new sequel Go! Go! Kokopolo 3D. Set across 80 brand new stages of pure arcade mayhem, help the hyperactive wildcat, Kokopolo, and his insane buddies track down a secret recipe for immortality by causing as much mischief as possible in this epic, action-packed caper, only for the Nintendo 3DS.

Releasing USA - 23rd Feb 2017
Releasing EUR - TBA
Releasing JP - TBA

http://www.kokopolo.com

Go! Go! Kokopolo (c) Tanukii Studios Limited 2017

Special thanks to Daisy Parker for creating the Plush Dolls used in this trailer - http://www.etsy.com/shop/DaisysCraftDesigns
